Brief HClust description. Descripción de HClust.\hypertarget{index_description_main}{}\doxysubsection{How to run}\label{index_description_main}
The hclust module is executed by running the following on console\+:

\begin{quote}
{\ttfamily python3 -\/m hclust \texorpdfstring{$<$}{<}dir\+\_\+raw\+\_\+tractography\texorpdfstring{$>$}{>} \texorpdfstring{$<$}{<}Max\+Distance\+\_\+\+Threshold\texorpdfstring{$>$}{>} \texorpdfstring{$<$}{<}maxdist\texorpdfstring{$>$}{>} \texorpdfstring{$<$}{<}var\texorpdfstring{$>$}{>} \texorpdfstring{$<$}{<}result\+\_\+path\texorpdfstring{$>$}{>}} \end{quote}
Donde la definición de cada argumento se puede encontrar en el siguiente enlace\+: \mbox{\hyperlink{namespacehclust_1_1main}{hclust.\+main}} Where each argument\textquotesingle{}s definition can be found in the following link\+: \mbox{\hyperlink{namespacehclust_1_1main}{hclust.\+main}}
